DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess long term safety , tolerability , immunogenicity ACC-001 , investigational active immunization product+ , subject mild moderate Alzheimer 's disease .
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Extension Study Evaluating Safety , Tolerability Immunogenicity Of ACC-001 In Subjects With Mild To Moderate Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Subjects randomize previous 3134K1200 study ( NCT00479557 ) meet inclusion/and none exclusion criterion Screening brain MRI scan consistent diagnosis AD ' MiniMental State Examination ( MMSE ) score =10 Significant Neurological Disease Alzheimer 's disease Brain MRI evidence vasogenic edema ( VE ) precede 3134K1 200 study ( NCT00479557 ) Clinically significant systemic illness
